General.Name: Servicios Corporativos Javer
General.Description: Servicios Corporativos Javer, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a housing developer in Mexico. The company engages in the construction and sale of low-income, middle-income, and residential housings. It operates in the states of Nuevo Leon, Aguascalientes, Jalisco, Estado de México, Ciudad de México, Querétaro, Quintana Roo, and Tamaulipas. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Monterrey, Mexico.
General.Address: Pabellón M Piso 34, Monterrey, NL, Mexico, 64000
